fields.heading: Looking for Flats in Gurugram
fields.about: With real estate skyrocketing, this is the right time to buy flats in Gurgaon! Gurugram in Haryana is the second-largest information technology hub and the country's third-largest banking and financial hub. Serving as a headquarters for many companies, Gurugram has emerged as a leader in the manufacturing and real estate sectors. This rapid development in the real estate sector has led to a sharp rise in commercial and residential housing. Following this, there has been an increase in property dealings in Gurugram. Gurgaon is one of the largest cities in Haryana that houses a considerable modern population from all over India and abroad. The city is a key BPO and IT business centre, where a range of renowned MNCs currently operate. This makes Gurugram a popular and profitable investment hub.
fields.readMore:
Why Buy a Property in Gurugram?

Due to its thriving nightlife options and good employment prospects, Gurgaon is known to attract potential homebuyers from around the country. The city has seen a boom in the realty sector, mostly post-COVID-19. The city is home to various multinational corporations, Fortune 500 companies, start-ups and businesses that have catalysed the migration of people from states across India. The rapid commercial development has further prompted migrants to settle down here and provided a boost to residential real estate.

Real Estate Boom in Gurugram

With the real estate sector witnessing a boom in Gurugram, Adani Realty has emerged as one of the top players in the residential, commercial, and retail spaces categories. Adani Realty focuses on creating spaces that offer state-of-the-art facilities and are in harmony with nature. Adani Realty has several flats in Gurugram, which are among the most sought-after in the city. These projects offer residents great living spaces! From ready-to-move residential flats to villas and penthouses in Gurugram, Adani has something for everyone.

If you plan to buy a 3 or 4 BHK apartment in Gurugram, you will have a host of properties to choose from, such as Samsara at Golf Course Extension Road. Samsara is a spectacular property located in what is considered one of the prestigious townships in Gurugram. The phase I of Samsara is ready-to-move in, and phase II of the project, Samsara Vilasa 2.0 is currently under construction.

These 3 & 4 BHK residences are part of the joint venture between Adani Realty and Brahma Group. These apartments in Gurugram offer modern amenities. For someone who wants to buy a flat in Gurugram, Samsara by Adani Realty is an option worth considering!

faqItems.title: Does Adani Realty offer flats in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: Yes, Adani Realty offers many options for flats in Gurgaon. Samsara Vilasa, Samsara Vilasa 2.0, Oyster Grande, Platinum Tower at Oyster Grande, Aangan, and Samsara (M Block) by Adani Realty offer luxurious flats in Gurgaon.

faqItems.title: Which are RERA-approved projects in Gurgaon by Adani Realty?
faqItems.body: Samsara Vilasa, Samsara Vilasa 2.0, Oyster Grande, Platinum Tower at Oyster Grande, Aangan, and Samsara (M Block) by Adani Realty are Haryana RERA approved projects offering flats in Gurgaon.

faqItems.title: What are the popular residential projects in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: There are many residential projects in Gurgaon which offer apartments in popular localities with good infrastructure and connectivity. Samsara Vilasa, Samsara Vilasa 2.0, Oyster Grande, Platinum Tower at Oyster Grande, Aangan, and Samsara (M Block) by Adani Realty offer luxurious apartments in Gurgaon.

faqItems.title: What is the price of flats in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: The price of flats in Gurgaon depends on the builder's reputation, project typology, configuration, locality, amenities, construction quality, stamp duty and registration charges, brokerage fee, and other additional costs. You can easily find your dream home within your budget in Gurgaon.

faqItems.title: Are there any new launch residential projects in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: Yes, Gurgaon offers a variety of new launch projects. Samsara Vilasa, Samsara Vilasa 2.0, Oyster Grande, Platinum Tower at Oyster Grande, Aangan, and Samsara (M Block) are newly launched residential projects by Adani Realty.

faqItems.title: What are some of the factors one needs to keep in mind before purchasing flats in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: One needs to keep in mind the following factors before purchasing flats in Gurgaon -location, connectivity to the airport and metro, proximity to hospitals, markets and educational institutions in the vicinity.

faqItems.title: How to get a home loan to buy a flat in Gurgaon?
faqItems.body: Adani Realty has exclusive tie-ups with leading banks that could help you with your home loan options.

faqItems.title: Which are the ready-to-move projects in Gurgaon that offer residential flats?
faqItems.body: There are many ready-to-move in flats available in Gurgaon. You can find various options in every budget with good connectivity plus all the modern amenities. Adani Realty offers many options for apartments in Gurgaon. At present, Oyster Grande and Samsara (M Block) by Adani Realty offer ready-to-move in flats.
